member.name: T:Universal.Common.Serialization.BinarySerializable
member.summary: Represents an object that can be serialized to a byte array. Deriving classes need to be declared with .

member.summary: Returns the byte array representation of the object. Throws an exception if the class is not declared with .

member.name: T:Universal.Common.Serialization.JsonSerializable
member.summary: Represents an object that can be serialized to a JSON string representation.

member.name: M:Universal.Common.Serialization.JsonSerializable.ToString``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Serializes this object to a JSON string by considering the fields it implements as part of the generic type definitions passed to this method. All properties are serialized according to their interface defition as well.
